Design: Black embossed digits with black border on yellow background; ARIZONA and last two digits of registration year embossed in black and centered at top between screw holes
Slogan: GRAND CANYON STATE embossed in black and centered at bottom

Design: Green embossed digits with green border on pale orange background; ARIZONA and last two digits of registration year embossed in green and centered at top between screw holes
Slogan: GRAND CANYON STATE embossed in green and centered at bottom

Design: White embossed digits with white embossed border on maroon background, with white embossed saguaro cactus dividing the letters and numbers; ARIZONA embossed in white and centered at top
Slogan: GRAND CANYON STATE embossed in white and centered at bottom

Design: Dark green embossed digits on screened background of purple mountains and cacti with white setting sun and sky fading from orange to white to turquoise at top; ARIZONA in wide plain dark green letters outlined in white and centered at top
Slogan: GRAND CANYON STATE in dark green thin plain letters at bottom right in orange part of screen
Notes: Awarded \Plate of the Year\" for best new license plate of 1996 by the Automobile License Plate Collectors Association

Design: Dark green screened digits on screened background of purple mountains and cacti with white setting sun and sky fading from orange to white to turquoise at top; ARIZONA in wide plain dark green letters outlined in white and centered at top; security stripe through center of plate
Slogan: GRAND CANYON STATE in dark green thin plain letters at bottom right in orange part of screen
